sourcesContent: import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Row, Button, Table, Col, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import MainScreen from '../../components/MainScreen/MainScreen'; const Tareas = () => { const [productos, setProductos] = useState(""); const [cantidad, setCantidad] = useState(""); return ( Productos setProductos(e.target.value)}> Cantidad setCantidad(e.target.value)} /> hola ) } export default Tareas
